tool_description: Performs kriging interpolation to estimate values at unmeasured locations using geostatistical methods with variogram models for optimal spatial prediction.

sample_points_path.description: Path to file containing known sample points and values

variogram_model_path.description: Path to file containing fitted variogram model parameters

estimation_grid_path.description: Path to file defining grid points for interpolation

kriging_type.description: Type of kriging: ordinary, simple, or universal

search_radius.description: Maximum search radius for neighboring samples in meters

min_samples.description: Minimum number of samples required for interpolation

max_samples.description: Maximum number of samples to use for interpolation

error_messages: Sample points file not accessible: Ensure sample_points_path is valid and contains coordinate and value data.
Variogram model file not found: The variogram_model_path must point to a valid variogram model file.
Estimation grid file missing: Provide a valid estimation_grid_path defining interpolation locations.
Invalid kriging type: Use one of [ordinary, simple, universal] for kriging_type.
Invalid search parameters: search_radius must be positive, min_samples ≥ 1, max_samples ≥ min_samples.
Insufficient sample coverage: Some grid points have fewer than min_samples within search_radius.
Incompatible variogram model: The variogram model format is incompatible with the sample data.
usage: Provide sample points, fitted variogram model, and estimation grid. Specify kriging type and search parameters. The tool performs kriging interpolation and returns estimated values with uncertainty measures.

interpolated_points.description: Number of grid points successfully interpolated

estimation_variance.description: Average estimation variance across all interpolated points

cross_validation_error.description: Root mean square error from cross-validation

interpolation_summary.description: Summary of kriging interpolation results and quality metrics
